p: At regional scales, across tropical rainforests and southern hemispheric semiarid regions, NPP‐driven variability in NBP accounts for more than 80% of the variance of NBP over all timescales from inter‐annual to centennial (Figures 4a, 4c, and 4e). But for boreal forests and alpine grasslands, the variance in NBP is split nearly evenly between variability associated with NPP (50‐60%) and k eco (40‐50%) on interannual timescales (Figures 4b, 4d, and 4df).
